TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConsoleTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 将跟踪或调试输出指引至标准输出或标准错误流。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output to either the standard output or the standard error stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类将跟踪和调试消息写入控制台。Use the class to write trace and debugging messages to the console. 您可以对 对象进行初始化，以将跟踪消息写入 流或 流中。You can initialize a object to write trace messages to the stream or to the stream. > [!IMPORTANT] > 接口。 interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在`try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a`try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 启用跟踪和调试输出后， 消息将写入指定的 流，这与用 或 方法编写消息的方式类似。When trace and debugging output is enabled, the messages are written to the specified stream, which is similar to the way messages are written with the or methods. 在控制台应用程序中， 的输出和错误流将消息写入现有控制台窗口，或者可以重定向流以写入 实例。In a console application, the output and error streams write messages to the existing console window, or you can redirect the streams to write to a instance. > [!NOTE] > 如果控制台不存在（例如，在基于 Windows 的应用程序中），则不会显示写入控制台的消息。If the console does not exist, as in a Windows-based application, messages written to the console are not displayed. 如果希望将通过 、或 编写的消息写入控制台，请将 对象添加到相应的 集合。Add a object to the appropriate collection if you want messages written through , , or to be written to the console. 此外，还可以使用 或 方法将消息直接写入控制台。In addition, you can write messages directly to the console using the or methods. > [!NOTE] > 和 类共享同一 集合，通过各自的 `Listeners` 属性进行访问。The and classes share the same collection, accessed through their respective `Listeners` properties. 如果使用这些类之一将 对象添加到集合中，则其他类将自动使用同一个侦听器。If you add a object to the collection using one of these classes, the other class automatically uses the same listener. 大多数编译器通过条件编译标志启用跟踪和调试输出。Most compilers enable trace and debug output through conditional compilation flags. 如果不启用跟踪或调试，则会有效地忽略通过 和 类写入的消息。If you do not enable tracing or debugging, the messages written through the and classes are effectively ignored. 启用跟踪和调试输出的语法特定于编译器;如果使用C#或 Visual Basic 以外的编译器，请参阅编译器的文档。The syntax to enable trace and debug output is compiler specific; if you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要在中C#启用调试，请在编译代码时将 **/d： DEBUG**标志添加到编译器命令行，也可以将 **#define 调试**添加到文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the **/d:DEBUG**flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add **#define DEBUG** to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，将 **/d： DEBUG = True**标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the **/d:DEBUG=True** flag to the compiler command line. - 若要在中C#启用跟踪，请在编译代码时将 **/d： TRACE**标志添加到编译器命令行，或将 **#define 跟踪**添加到文件的顶部。To enable tracing in C#, add the **/d:TRACE** flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add **#define TRACE** to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，将 **/d： TRACE = True**标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the **/d:TRACE=True** flag to the compiler command line. 你可以在代码中将 对象添加到 集合，也可以通过应用程序配置文件将 对象添加到 集合。You can add a object to the collection in your code, or you can add a object to the collection through the application configuration file. 在代码中添加 对象，以写入特定代码节或执行路径的消息。Add the object in your code to write messages for a specific code section or execution path. 将 对象添加到应用程序配置文件中，以便在应用程序执行时将所有跟踪和调试消息定向到控制台。Add the object in your application configuration file to direct all trace and debug messages to the console while the application executes. 若要为特定代码段将跟踪和调试消息写入控制台，请初始化 对象并将其添加到 集合。To write trace and debug messages to the console for a specific section of code, initialize a object and add it to the collection. 使用 或 类检测包含消息的代码部分。Instrument the section of code that contains messages using the or classes. 在代码部分的末尾，从 集合中删除 对象，并对 调用 方法。At the end of the code section, remove the object from the collection, and call the method on the . 若要在应用程序执行时将所有跟踪和调试消息定向到控制台，请将 对象添加到应用程序配置文件中。To direct all trace and debug messages to the console while the application executes, add a object to the application configuration file. 编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件，或者编辑 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] 项目中的 app.config 文件。Edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application, or the app.config file in a [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] project. 在此文件中，为 插入一个元素。In this file, insert an element for a . 下面的示例将名为 `configConsoleListener` 的 对象添加到 集合。The following example adds a object named `configConsoleListener` to the collection. ```xml ``` 有关在应用程序配置文件中添加跟踪侦听器的详细信息，请参阅[<侦听器>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-trace.md)。For details about adding trace listeners in the application configuration file, see [<listeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-trace.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了一个控制台应用程序，其中包含具有两个公共方法的类。The following code example implements a console application consisting of a class with two public methods. `Main` 方法检查命令行参数，并确定是否应将跟踪输出定向到标准错误流或标准输出流。The `Main` method examines the command-line arguments and determines if trace output should be directed to the standard error stream or the standard output stream. `Main` 创建并初始化指定 输出流的 对象，并将此对象添加到跟踪侦听器集合。`Main` creates and initializes a object for the specified output stream, and adds this object to the trace listener collection. 然后，它调用 `WriteEnvironmentInfoToTrace` 方法，该方法将有关执行环境的详细信息和跟踪侦听器配置写入跟踪输出。It then calls the `WriteEnvironmentInfoToTrace` method, which writes details about the executing environment and the trace listener configuration to the trace output. 当示例应用程序运行时，环境和跟踪配置详细信息将通过 对象写入指定的控制台输出流中。When the example application runs, the environment and trace configuration details are written to the specified console output stream through the object. [!code-csharp[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/VB/consoletrace.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并将跟踪输出写入标准输出流中。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with trace output written to the standard output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化 对象以将消息写入 流。This constructor initializes a object to write messages to the stream. 其 属性初始化为空字符串（""）。Its property is initialized to an empty string (""). ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化指定 输出流的 对象，并将其添加到跟踪侦听器集合。The following code example initializes a object for the specified output stream and adds it to the trace listener collection. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/VB/consoletrace.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool useErrorStream) cil managed

param.name: useErrorStream
param.span: 若为 ，则将跟踪和调试输出写入标准错误流中；若为 ，则将跟踪和调试输出写入标准输出流中。

span.span: to write tracing and debugging output to the standard error stream; to write tracing and debugging output to the standard output stream.

summary.span: 初始化 类的一个新实例，并利用一个选项将跟踪输出写入标准输出流或标准错误流中。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with an option to write trace output to the standard output stream or the standard error stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化 对象，以将消息写入 或 流。This constructor initializes a object to write messages to either the or the stream. 其 属性初始化为空字符串（""）。Its property is initialized to an empty string (""). ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化指定 输出流的 对象，并将其添加到跟踪侦听器集合。The following code example initializes a object for the specified output stream and adds it to the trace listener collection. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Diagnostics_ConsoleTraceListener/VB/consoletrace.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭到为此跟踪侦听器指定的流的输出。

span.span: Closes the output to the stream specified for this trace listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为此 实例（ 流或 流）指定的流已关闭。The stream specified for this instance (either the stream or the stream) is closed.
